textContent: Give players the ability to teach other players the KNOWLEDGE of spells of their discipline. Only trusted RPers can be granted this privilege, and they will be monitored. The idea is that they would be incentivized to create "quests" of their own in order for the trainee to learn.
title: Players as masters
